00041 #ifndef _Camera_cpp
00042 #define _Camera_cpp
00043 
00044 #include "camera.h"
00045 #include <Ogre.h>
00046 
00047 namespace phys
00048 {
00049     Camera::Camera(CameraManager* Manager)
00050     {
00051         String Name = Manager->CreateCamera();
00052         Cam = Manager->FindCamera(Name);
00053         CamManager=Manager;
00054     }
00055 
00056     Camera::Camera(Ogre::Camera* Camera, CameraManager* Manager)
00057     {
00058         Cam=Camera;
00059         CamManager=Manager;
00060     }
00061 
00062     Camera::~Camera()
00063     {
00064     }
00065 
00066     void Camera::SetLocation(Vector3 Location)
00067     {
00068         this->Cam->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00069     }
00070 
00071     void Camera::SetDirection(Vector3 Direction)
00072     {
00073         this->Cam->setDirection(Direction.GetOgreVector3());
00074     }
00075 
00076     void Camera::SetOrientation(Quaternion Orientation)
00077     {
00078         this->Cam->setOrientation(Orientation.GetOgreQuaternion());
00079     }
00080 
00081     void Camera::SetNearClipDistance(Real NearDist)
00082     {
00083         this->Cam->setNearClipDistance(NearDist);
00084     }
00085 
00086     void Camera::SetFarClipDistance(Real FarDist)
00087     {
00088         this->Cam->setFarClipDistance (FarDist);
00089     }
00090 
00091     void Camera::SetAspectRatio(Real Ratio)
00092     {
00093         this->Cam->setAspectRatio(Ratio);
00094     }
00095 
00096     void Camera::LookAt(Vector3 TargetLoc)
00097     {
00098         this->Cam->lookAt(TargetLoc.GetOgreVector3());
00099     }
00100 
00101     void Camera::SetFixedYawAxis(bool UseFixed, Vector3 Axis)
00102     {
00103         this->Cam->setFixedYawAxis(UseFixed, Axis.GetOgreVector3());
00104     }
00105 
00106     void Camera::SetFixedYawAxis(bool UseFixed)
00107     {
00108         this->Cam->setFixedYawAxis(UseFixed);
00109     }
00110 
00111     void Camera::SetAutoTracking(bool Enabled, String Target, Vector3 Offset)
00112     {
00113         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = CamManager->FindNode(Target);
00114         this->Cam->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00115     }
00116 
00117     void Camera::SetAutoTracking(bool Enabled, String Target)
00118     {
00119         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = CamManager->FindNode(Target);
00120         this->Cam->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00121     }
00122 
00123     Ray Camera::GetCameraToViewportRay(Real Screenx, Real Screeny)
00124     {
00125         Ray R(this->Cam->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00126         return R;
00127     }
00128 
00129     String Camera::GetNodeAttachedToCamera()
00130     {
00131         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->Cam->getParentSceneNode();
00132         return tempnode->getName();
00133     }
00134 
00135     Vector3 Camera::GetCameraRelativeLocation()
00136     {
00137         Vector3 camloc(this->Cam->getPosition());
00138         return camloc;
00139     }
00140 
00141     Vector3 Camera::GetCameraGlobalLocation()
00142     {
00143         Vector3 camloc(this->Cam->getRealPosition());
00144         return camloc;
00145     }
00146 
00147     void Camera::ZoomCamera(Real Zoom)
00148     {
00149         Ogre::Vector3 zoomlevel(0,0,Zoom);
00150         this->Cam->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00151     }
00152 
00153     void Camera::ResetZoom()
00154     {
00155         Ogre::Vector3 loc;
00156         loc = this->Cam->getPosition();
00157         Real zoom=loc.z;
00158         zoom=0-zoom;
00159         this->Cam->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00160     }
